entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The RealParent on XXX has been Garbage Collected #23691
  • Square brackets in WebView URL Sources result in ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND on Android #23690
  • Border on iOS redraws with 1 frame lag, creating lag before drawn 1 frame after other elements #23688
  • Remove IHybridWebView properties #23687
    9.0-preview7
  • [WinUI] CollectionView GridItemsLayout Shows 6 Columns Even When Span is Set to 7, When Display Scale is Set to 125% or 150% #23684
  • App crashes when returning to app from background [main/xamarin_main/monotouch-main/etc.) #23682
  • Memory increases when switching the tabs. #23680
    Backlog
  • [WINDOWS, 9.0 Preview 6] AppShell.Navigated throws System.ArgumentException in Microsoft.Maui.FontManager #23678
  • IWKScriptMessageHandlerWithReply has a bad implementation of DidReceiveScriptMessage #23677
  • [MAUI] I1_Layout - Horizontal grid for DataTemplate page does not display four-row of grid and the content of step3. #23675
    Backlog
  • Page.IsBusy activity idicators gets stuck/causes multiple to be displayed #23674
    Backlog
  • DataTrigger does not work on Mac Catalyst #23672

Closed

  • HybridWebView core features: static files and simple messages #22302
    .NET 9 Planning
  • IntuneMAMAppConfig returns NULL value in IOS MAUI application #23670
  • Remove bumptech.glide.load.data java package from maui app #23660
  • Suddenly, iOS crashes with “Model building is not supported when publishing with NativeAOT. Use a compiled model” #23653
  • Could not find Android Resource.. #19645
  • [Windows] App works in Debug and Release configurations but crashes in Microsoft Store #23652

PullRequests

Created

  • Use UIView.Window instead of the global window #23693
  • Obsolete setting mainpage via application #23692
  • [xaml] improve performance of `BindableProperty.TryConvert` #23685
    area-xaml, t/perf
  • Bring back ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource #23683
    area-xaml, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • [Binding SG] Add warning when trying to access private members #23671

Merged

  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview7
  • [net9.0] Comment out shell test #23676
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [ci] Fix maestro publishing for stable packages (#23664) #23681
  • [ci] Fix maestro publishing for stable packages #23664
    area-infrastructure
  • [tests] Fix iOS screenshot for sonoma #23667
    area-testing, testing-flakiness

Updated

  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • [ci] Use drop service for SDK insertion artifacts #23658
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Add embedding sample and code #23642
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changin - fix #23343
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Android] Custom shell back button color #22940
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed the picker title's color #23075
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • [Windows] Handle non-seekable streams in `PlatformImage.FromStream` #23626
    community ✨
  • Visual state change for disabled RadioButton #23471
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-webview
  • [android] improve performance of `ImageHandler.PlatformArrange()` #23665
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [android] use cached value for `GetDisplayDensity()` #23666
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [XC] Compile StaticResource when possible #20917
    area-xaml
  • [X] Dont SetBinding for values returned by OnIdiom #23272
    area-xaml
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Binding SG] Add warning when referencing results of other source generators #23646
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
